title: My Pixel 2 XL turned off everytime when i plug in the USB to PC/ OTG to Pixel 2 XL
content: Please help! After i installed my Android Q beta. Everything is worse and when i want to tried to transfer my files from phone to my PC it's always suddenly turned off itself. So i'm tired of the bugs and getting back to stable version (Android Pie) But it's still the same!
